item.title: saltstack gitfs
item.author: info@roylarsen.xyz (Roy Larsen)
item.description: Saltstack gitfs This is mostly notes for myself, but I wanted to write up an easy reference. basics This is to get a basic setup with a map from saltenv to git branch. This requires some basic knowlege of saltstack concepts like pillar, salt environments. My setup is pretty simplistic, I have two main branches: master and dev. The branches are present in the state and pillar repos. Top files are managed per-repo, per-branch (there are probably better ways of handling it, but this is fine for right now).
